Name: Deluxe Fountain Pen
Description: Of the highest quality, the owners of these inkwells lavish their wealth.

DescriptionLocalization.es: De la más alta calidad, los dueños de estos tinteros prodigan su riqueza.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 이 잉크병의 소유자는 최고 품질의 부를 아낌없이 사용합니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Von höchster Qualität verschwenden die Besitzer dieser Tintenfässer ihren Reichtum.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: De la plus haute qualité, les propriétaires de ces encriers prodiguent leur richesse.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: A legjobb minőségű tintatartók tulajdonosai pazarolják vagyonukat.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Di altissima qualità, i proprietari di questi calamai prodigano la loro ricchezza.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 最高品質の中で、これらのインク壺の所有者は彼らの富を惜しみません。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Da mais alta qualidade, os possuidores desses tinteiros esbajam sua riqueza.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Владельцы этих чернильниц высочайшего качества расточают свое богатство.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: En yüksek kalitede olan bu hokkaların sahipleri servetlerini cömertçe sunarlar.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 这些墨水瓶的拥有者拥有最高品质的财富。
